name: Caluren
description:
Kate Anderson is dead....   Stabbed 13 times in a forest. But there is no doubt who- or what- killed her. It stalks them....     watches them....   hunts them.....

Everybody knows these woods. And you know what they are known for.

                                 ---

This game was made in Unreal Engine 4. It took 2 weeks to make, and might receive a short sequel later. Might. It all depends on my motivation to work on this project and what rating it gets. I will also probably be releasing this game on Steam soon.

I hope you enjoy.   :)

Note: This game is best played with headphones, in the dark.

(Headphones for 3D sound, and darkness for maximum atmosphere.)

(WARNING: This game has loud noises that may startle some people, and also has a few strobe/flicker light effects.)
